(Tw) popular given name (one that will turn many heads if you shout it at a marketplace) (from Taiwanese 菜市仔名, Tai-lo pr. [tshài-tshī-á-miâ], where 菜市仔 means "marketplace")

sentences.english: "compare the price with several shops, it's boon like buying vegetable in the market".
sentences.chinese: 貨比三家還有東西送，跟菜市場買菜一樣實惠。
九龍旺角區菜市場豬肉攤。

sentences.english: Do the black bamboo yard park have a market hall nearby?
sentences.chinese: 紫竹院公園附近有沒有菜市場？

sentences.english: Market reopen after a cessation of business, clients because buy, be less than aquatic product roughhouse.
sentences.chinese: 菜市場開市，顧客們因爲買不到水產大吵大鬧。

sentences.english: The food market are full of fish and meat, shopping and cooking become the main activities for people.
sentences.chinese: 菜市場魚肉滿架，購物和烹調成了人們的主要活動。

sentences.english: A steep market street descends from the Mid-Levels to Sheung Wan.
sentences.chinese: 半山一個建於陡坡的菜市場，沿街伸展到上環。

sentences.english: We walked along a few blocks until we reached the market.
sentences.chinese: 我們走過了好幾條街纔到達菜市場。

sentences.english: Yesterday, 9:40 Xu, reporters came to a dozen village markets.
sentences.chinese: 昨天上午9時40分許，記者來到了十家村菜市場。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the infection condition of sparganum of Spirometra mansoni in frogs from Guangzhou city during the last four years.
sentences.chinese: 目的瞭解廣州市肉菜市場虎紋蛙感染裂頭蚴的情況。

sentences.english: My entire monthly pension of $147 is spent on food.
sentences.chinese: 我一個月的退休金是147塊美元，全用在菜市場了。

sentences.english: He said to himself that he was probably in the sewer des Halles;
sentences.chinese: 他想他大概是在菜市場的陰溝中。

sentences.english: Buy fresh fruit and homemade jam at the farmer's market.
sentences.chinese: 在菜市場買點新鮮的水果和自制果醬。

sentences.english: Wang said sales of pure gold jewellery at Caishikou were stable.
sentences.chinese: 王春麗說菜市口的純金飾品的銷售額相當穩定。

sentences.english: Duo to the vegetable market to buy vegetables, kang to show jade get better treatment.
sentences.chinese: 二人到菜市場買菜，康爲比秀玉獲得更優厚的待遇。

sentences.english: Smoke hung over the roofs in the direction of the Halles.
sentences.chinese: 菜市場那邊的屋頂上冒着煙。

sentences.english: These food markets have more or less the same setup.
sentences.chinese: 幾個菜市場的格局差不多。
